data.title: The Reef Mactan Residences Condo for Sale Lapu
data.meta_description: Dazzling! No word can describe this amazing beachfront sea view condo for sale with jaw-dropping amenities like you are in paradise of The Reef white sand.
data.text:
The Reef beachfront condo for sale

Reservation/purchasing of this unit can be done personally in the office OR online! All payments must be directly deposited to the Reef's bank account.

The Reef Condo Unit Types;

REEF CondoTel

REEF Studio

REEF 1 Bedroom

We are pleased to present to you our project THE REEF RESIDENCES MACTAN. We boast of a luxury condo literally fronting the sea.

The Reef Island Resort in 72X8+G7 Lapu-Lapu City, 6015 Cebu, PH is a 22-story beachfront residential condominium, a project by Land Caster Estates – one of the pioneer condominium developers here in Cebu with 20 years of experience.

Is a luxury condo, which offers first-class amenities with a stunning infinity pool and features a 180-meter unhindered view of the ocean. Impressive local craftsmanship of the interior design that reflects Filipino culture designed by renowned architects and designers.

All units designed with glass walls, glass railings, and a glass sliding door facing the sea view. You can also enjoy staying with your balcony, embracing the sea breeze and the sky.

The aqua sports facilities such as jet ski, wakeboarding, kayak, hobby cat sail, water playgrounds, among others will be definitely part of your resort-living. Here are the lists of the amenities offer:

FEATURES and AMENITIES:

Beachfront boardwalk with an outdoor cafe

Wide 250-meter seafront

Ample parking spaces for all units.

24-Hour Security

All units with wide, spacious balconies facing the sea

24-Hour Standby Full Generator.

Interior gardens, open facades, reflecting pools in the lobby

Large 274 square meter infinity pool facing the sea.

Water sports facilities: Jetskis, speedboat, kayak, water park, Hobie cat sail, banana boat, wakeboards

Mini movie theater

Parking slots for jetski and speedboat owners.

Units include built-in split type aircon

All units with full kitchen cabinets, wardrobe cabinets, cooktop and hood

Glass walls facing the sea with glass balcony railings.

Ramp for launching jetskis and speedboats

Helipad

High-speed elevators

ABACA REEF HOTEL:

Abaca Boutique Hotel

Abaca Restaurant + Cafe

Spa

Function hall for parties

Outdoor poolside cafe’s

Skylounge/Bar

Gym.

REEF is the flagship project of Land Caster, envisioned to be a lifestyle home, something is never before done in Cebu. It is a 22-storey beachfront luxury condo, which offers first-class amenities, total luxury lifestyle living. All units will have glass walls, glass railings, and glass sliding doors facing the sea (east). Ample balconies are provided to every unit to extend the living space outdoors. A full range of aqua sports facilities (jet ski, speed boats, wakeboarding, kayak, hobby cat sail, water playgrounds, etc.) will be offered as basic features. An award-winning restaurant/ café will be operating in the lobby. Abaca group is renowned to be one of the best restaurants in the country and even in Asia. They will operate a boutique hotel with function rooms, a gym, spa, and sky lounge bar. The pool will be a huge infinity type overlooking the sea. Homeowners have the option of buying their own watercraft and they can buy a parking slot downstairs. There will be a lounge area on the boardwalk that directly connects to the beachfront/sea.

THE DEVELOPER

Land Caster Estates belongs to the group of companies under EXELAND/ NEXLAND Estates. It includes Land Resources (Mindanao) and Questhomes. Inc with almost 2 decades of experience in developing subdivisions and condominiums. We are one of the pioneer condominium developers in Cebu, dating back to as early as 1996. We have built a reputation for quality, reliability, and good customer service. The Board of directors composed of Allan Lua, Harley Yunam, Jerry Sun, Michael Jo, Perry Lim, and Gabriel Alonzo. The Board’s core business extends to a varied field including manufacturing, export/ import, agricultural, real estate, construction, and retailing.

A LANDMARK COLLABORATION

Of worthy mention is The Reef’s phenomenal design team, comprised of the Philippines’ most renowned architects and designers: the partnership of Budji Layug + Royal Pineda, hailed as the country’s preeminent architectural and interior design firm, with the input of world-famous designer Kenneth Cobonpue, whose unmistakable touch can be seen in many details of the project.

In a breathtaking and unprecedented collaboration, these three design titans have created a landmark structure that is an expression of their technical and artistic talents. Because of this rare synergism, The Reef is a historic masterpiece that is a prestigious testament to its owners’ excellent level of taste.

AN ELITE PARTNERSHIP

On its first few floors, The Reef is a luxury boutique hotel run by the award-winning Abaca Group. Abaca’s superb track record is proven by its international accolades, being excellently reviewed by many famous magazines and awarded high ratings by the world’s most prestigious travel authorities.

PROJECTED RETURN ON INVESTMENT OF THE CONDOTEL:

Monthly Share at 55% Occupancy – P20,010

Monthly Share at 60% Occupancy – P21,829

Monthly Share at 65% Occupancy – P23,649

Monthly Share at 70% Occupancy – P25,467

Monthly Share at 75% Occupancy – P27,287

PAYMENT OPTIONS:

20% Equity payable in 12 months, 80% balance thru spot cash or bank financing.

Spot 30% downpayment with 5% discount of the DP and 70% balance thru bank financing

Spot Cash with 6% discount on the Total Contract Price.

PAYMENT OPTIONS for RESIDENTIAL

20% Equity spread over 12 months, 80% Bank loan.

Straight DP - 5% discount on DP

Outright Cash - 6% discount.

Experience luxurious beachfront living in The Reef Mactan condo for sale in Lapu-lapu City. Choose from their available unit types including studio with balcony - CondoTel, studio with balcony - Residential, and 1 bedroom with balcony - Residential. Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece of paradise.
